title: Samsung Galaxy Watch5
heading: Samsung Galaxy Watch5 Bluetooth (44 mm, Graphite, Compatible with Android only)
description: Sleep Tracking: Know your sleep with our new and improved sleep tracking technology. Plan your bedtime, detect snoring, understand and track your sleep.
Body composition Analysis (BIA Measurement): Monitor everything from body fat percentage (BIA) to skeletal muscle weight. All the feedback you need to track your progress.
Optical Heart Rate Sensor: Monitor your heart rate and track your cardiovascular health.
